abstract: Alexandra Trusova, a 17-year-old Russian skater who finished third at the world championship last year, fell seconds in her program, when she attempted the night’s final triple axel and under-rotated. Anna Shcherbakova, the final Russian teenager to compete, did not try to follow Kamila Valieva or Alexandra Trusova with a triple axel attempt. But her more modest program — including powerful, hypnotizing spins, a triple flip, a step sequence and so forth — was a compelling showcase of her talents, which led her to a world title last year.
